mapper.update: update tb_refresh_token set refresh_token = #{refreshToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, token_key = #{tokenKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_token_key = #{mobileTokenKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, refresh_token, user_id, token_key, mobile_token_key, create_time, update_time from tb_refresh_token
